name: Corbin Church of the Nazarene Basket Ministry Project
description: The Basket Ministry exists to serve those in the community who are struggling to make ends meet. We provide basic household items like toilet paper, laundry detergent, and dish soap to help ease this burden. The ministry is a 501c3 non-profit organization run by the people of Corbin Nazarene Church. We meet monthly on the 3rd Tuesday of the month with doors opening at 9:30 AM. You need to be here by 10 AM to receive items. We spend a few moments in song and hear a brief message before any items are distributed.
source: Verified from official website, 211.org listings, and multiple online sources
hours: Third Tuesday of every month: Doors open at 9:30 AM, must arrive by 10 AM to receive items
notes: Free basket of household items and cleaning supplies. First come, first served. The ministry includes a brief worship service before distribution. Facebook page available at facebook.com/basketministry
